name: The Muse
long_description: The Muse is a values-based careers site that helps Gen Z and millennial candidates find a career path and search for jobs at companies whose people, benefits, and values align with their unique professional needs. For employers, our marketplace results in a more efficient hiring process that results in better "matches" - and therefore better retention.
one_liner: The Muse is values-based job search & hiring for 7M+ monthly

name: HireArt
long_description:
Hire Smarter with HireArt.

We're a modern staffing agency that uses work samples and video assessments to generate deeper insight & connect contractors to companies where they'll thrive.

Our graders and account managers individually assess each candidate on culture fit, experience, and communication skills. The proof is in the talent: our candidates have filled roles at leading start-up and technology companies like Facebook, Airbnb, and Waymo. 

We put people first, from our candidates to our clients, we believe in the power of transparent hiring.

Learn more about our team and our platform at HireArt.com.
one_liner: Gives businesses everything needed to hire & manage W2 contractors.

name: HackerRank
long_description:
At HackerRank, our mission is to change the world to value skills over pedigree.

Thousands of companies use our AI-powered platform to hire next-gen developers based on what they can do - not just whatâ€™s on their resume. From hiring to upskilling, we help teams identify and grow technical talent at every stage of the developer journey.

Over 26 million developers have joined the HackerRank Community to learn and certify their skills, practice interviewing, and discover relevant jobs.
one_liner: Change the world to value skills over pedigree

name: Snaptalent
long_description:
Snaptalent powers a distributed job advertisement network primarily meant for developer listings.

Job ads submitted to Snaptalent are displayed on the service's participating websites. A unique feature about the network is that it will detect the IP addresses of website visitors and attempt to identify whether they work for a particular company or attend a particular university. It will then serve up targeted ads that have been designated for, say, employees of Google or students of Carnegie Mellon.

name: Joberator
long_description:
Joberator was formed to tackle head-on the growing challenges and connection-gap issues in the STEM employment and recruitment marketplace. Our goal is to help the right talent and right employers connect together through accelerated, streamlined and STEM-specialized search / matching tools and features.

With a Centralized end-to-end platform where Graduates and Professionals can showcase their skills, plus access a unique connection-pipeline that empowers job seekers at all levels and in every Science, Technology, Engineering and Math fields - to 'Pinpoint' the right businesses who have the highest STEM employment and hiring demand for their skills, thus creating improved and increased hiring opportunities.

Employers can post jobs with fully integrated social recruitment features plus extended reach job distribution channels, and search profiles of top-tier talent members, connect privately, arrange interviews and hire directly on the Joberator platform.

Both Job seekers and Employers can create a Free account.

name: Lever
long_description:
Lever is one of the most recognized brands in talent acquisition software for high growth companies. We enable teams to post jobs, source, interview, and hire top talent. We've combined ATS & CRM into a single platform, Lever TRM. Our Talent Acquisition Suite also includes tools for recruitment marketing and analytics: Lever Nurture, Lever Advanced Analytics, and Lever Data Warehouse Sync. Our customers include Netflix, KPMG, Spotify, Talend, Cirque du Soleil, and over 5000 other customers.

Lever has raised $123 million in funding from Apax Digital, Adam Street Partners, Scale Venture Partners, Matrix Partners, and Y Combinator among others. With an overall gender ratio of 50:50, Lever is also fiercely committed to building a team culture that celebrates diversity and inclusion. For more information, visit https://www.lever.co/.
one_liner: Talent Acquisition Suite that combines ATS + Talent CRM

name: VoiceGem
one_liner: Voice messaging platform - Acquired by Palantir in 2013

name: Prophecy Sciences
long_description: Prophecy is quantifying the cognitive factors that determine workplace performance -- from mental aptitude, to personality traits, to decision-making styles and interpersonal dynamics.  Drawing from research across many subfields of neuroscience, we have created a suite of cognitive tests that integrate behavioral measures with sensors for collecting biosignals.  The data we collect is unlike that of any existing personality or aptitude test, and gives us the unique ability to predict a tremendous number of traits, characteristics, and job performance measures.  We help employers find the ideal person for a job, and we help managers optimize and motivate their teams.
one_liner: Predicting workplace performance through neuroscience

name: Hackermeter
one_liner: Replacing resume screening with code challenges.

name: UserGems
long_description:
UserGems is an AI-driven prospecting solution for revenue teams to drive bigger pipelines, faster sales cycles, and larger deals.

Whenever your customers change their jobs, UserGems automatically surfaces them as new leads to your sales reps directly in Salesforce. This enables reps to close more deals, faster.

Leveraging machine learning, UserGems automatically identifies other prospects that match your best customers. That means you get a complete, up-to-date list of leads that match your ICP, persona and other key criteria so that reps spend less time sourcing leads, and more time selling.
one_liner: AI-powered sales solution based on your best customers

name: Pomello
long_description:
Pomello maps your organizational culture on a team-by-team basis, and integrates with your existing recruiting process to allow you to find the candidates most likely to thrive within your organization. 

Founded at Stanford University, Pomelloâ€™s technology is based on 30 years of research in Organizational Behavior, which has been validated over time across multiple industries.
one_liner: Analytics software that helps companies measure organizationalâ€¦

name: HigherMe
long_description:
HigherMe is all-in-one hiring software for restaurant and retail businesses to easily recruit, screen, interview, and onboard employees. Quickly review applications, schedule interviews, manage job board postings, and fill out employee paperwork from anywhere on any device. 

Created by a former multi-unit franchisee, HigherMe reduces the time and cost of hiring using a mobile-first applicant tracking system, Text-To-Apply technology, one-click interview scheduling, video cover letters, and more. With over three million applications submitted using our cloud-based software, say goodbye to the stack of paper rÃ©sumÃ©s and easily fill open jobs anywhere, anytime.
one_liner: Helping restaurant employers find & hire better employees faster

name: Triplebyte
long_description: Triplebyte is LinkedIn for software engineers. We help great engineers find work at the fastest growing companies in the world, with the least amount of time and effort. We work with a wide range of companies, including Apple, Facebook, Stripe and Dropbox and a lot more of mid-sized and smaller companies.
one_liner: Intelligent technical hiring.

name: Jopwell
long_description: Jopwellâ€™s mission is to make a substantial, measurable impact on increasing Black, Latinx, and Native American representation in the workforce. Jopwell strives to build inclusive workplaces where our members can bring their authentic selves to work. We do this by assisting companies with their recruitment, marketing, and retention efforts for communities of color.

name: Bluecrew
long_description:
BlueCrew is an on-demand, data-driven staffing platform for blue collar jobs in Los Angeles, San Francisco Bay Area, Sacramento, and Reno. Bluecrew is a seed-stage, YC backed company creating software to automate outdated, and inefficient traditional temp agencies. We are the best platform to quickly fill positions with high-quality workers.

Bluecrew is an ideal staffing partner for companies looking for temporary, seasonal, or temp to hire workers for jobs including event staff, warehouse staff, drivers, forklift operators, data entry personnel, movers, and customer service reps. By innovating on screening, matching, dispatching, and time tracking technology, BlueCrew eliminates the major pain points of other alternatives.
one_liner: Bluecrew is a web based staffing agency.

name: Fountain
long_description: Fountainâ€™s all-in-one high volume hiring platform empowers the worldâ€™s leading enterprises to find the right people through smart, fast, and seamless recruiting. Candidates can apply anytime, anywhere in minutes, right from their phone. Automated and customizable processes streamline the candidate experience and save time for recruitment teams so they can scale with growing hiring needs. Advanced analytics provide end-to-end process visibility so managers can make swift, data-driven decisions. Throughout the candidate journey, the openly integrated platform enables companies to find, qualify and convert more applicants. Fountainâ€™s global customers hire over 1.2 million workers annually in 78 countries.
one_liner: High volume hiring made simple

name: Interviewed
long_description: Indeed, the worldâ€™s number one job site has acquired Interviewed - http://press.indeed.com/press/indeed-acquires-leading-hr-technology-company-interviewed/
one_liner: Job simulations and assessments.  See candidates in action doing theâ€¦

name: Instawork
long_description: Instawork is the on-demand staffing app for hourly workers and hospitality businesses. Our vision is to create economic opportunity for local businesses and professionals, globally. Workers need a better way to find great local jobs and businesses need a better way to find quality workers fast.
one_liner: A flexible work app that connects businesses with hourly workers.

name: Stealth Worker
long_description: We have hundreds of fully qualified and experienced contractors in Information Security, Cloud Security, Privacy and Compliance available at competitive hourly rates.
one_liner: Information Security (Cyber Security), Compliance and Privacy (GDPR &â€¦

name: StrongIntro
long_description: StrongIntro is a recruiting tool and a service that lets you tap into the networks of your existing employees. We do so by using both a software and human-centric approach, and we want to help you hire thoughtfully.
one_liner: StrongIntro helps recruiters turn their entire company into a sourceâ€¦

name: Loop Support
long_description: We build pre-employment assessments that accurately simulate the work your applicants will actually be doing on-the-job.

name: Sycamore
long_description: Sycamore is committed to up to date, clear earnings information for contractors. The goal is to let you choose the job that maximizes your earnings.
one_liner: Marketplace for companies to add a delivery driver in 5 minutes.

name: Fastpad
long_description:
Fastpad builds hiring software for the Indian market that gets rid of spam and ensures that companies can see quick snapshots of real candidates.

Fastpad is looking to create the dominant recruitment marketplace by cutting through the noise in an Indian hiring marketplace thatâ€™s growing 40 percent year-over-year.
one_liner: Hiring Software for India

name: Headstart
long_description:
Headstart (YC S17) uses Machine Learning technology to help employers identify the best-suited talent in the shortest period of time. We provide leading organisations with a solution designed to help them transition away from experience/qualification based screening and towards a more inclusive and effective process which considers personality, behaviours, strengths and motivations. In doing so, Headstart helps companies hire people truly aligned to their values, culture and exact job requirements in a seamless, engaging way.

The Headstart process is simple and effective: companies save time and money by finding candidates who meet their exact job requirements at an earlier stage, and job seekers connect directly with businesses through an engaging, reusable 15 minute application form. We ensure a transparent process and initiate productive dialogue, making candidates feel valued and helping companies hire the right people.
one_liner: Headstart uses Machine Learning to help companies decide on who toâ€¦

name: Commissary Club (formerly 70 Million Jobs)
long_description: We are the first/only national, for-profit employment platform for people with criminal records. With a community of 11 million+, we work with some of the country's largest employers, through our staffing business (70MillionStaffing.com) and job board (70MillionJobs.com). We've helped thousands of deserving men and women land a job and begin a safe, productive life.
one_liner: Social network for 70 million Americans with criminal records.

name: Gem
long_description:
Gemâ€™s talent engagement platform helps recruiting teams use data and automation to improve hiring speed, quality, and diversity.

Gem unifies data and context from the tools recruiters use every day, including email, applicant tracking systems, LinkedIn, and other social networks, to create a source of truth for all talent relationships. Armed with insights about the entire recruiting process, automation to reach out to talent at scale, and true cross-functional collaboration tools, TA teams can proactively and strategically plan for whatâ€™s ahead.

Gem's customers are savvy recruiting teams from industry-leading companies â€” like Wayfair, Dropbox, Nasdaq, Cisco, and Doordash â€” who understand that hiring the best talent in the market is key to maintaining their competitive advantage.
one_liner: Talent engagement platform

name: 10 By 10
long_description: 10by10 is a marketplace to instantly match qualified candidates with companies by pooling candidates across recruitment agencies. Check out the testimonials on our website (www.10by10.io).
one_liner: 10by10 is a unique marketplace in the recruiting agency industry forâ€¦

name: Candidate.ly
all_locations: New York, NY, USA; Vienna, Vienna, Austria; Remote
long_description: Candidately simplifies the process of sharing candidate resumes between staffing firms and their clients. Instead of relying on email attachments, Candidately offers a collaborative space where staffing firms can submit their top candidates, receive prompt client feedback, track client activity on candidate profiles, and increase the number of successful placements.

name: Torch
long_description:
Torch is a learning and development company that helps employers manage and measure employee growth at scale. Customers can draw from a pool of over 6000 mentors and coaches to pair with high performers and new managers at any layer of the organization. 

Torch was founded by a team of executive coaches and experienced psychologists who are passionate about helping all professionals perform at their highest level.

Torch is on a mission to empower managers to thrive in high growth, high-performance cultures by building the self-awareness and skills required to manage and lead effectively.

name: Key Values
one_liner: Helping software developers find teams that share their values.

name: SharpestMinds
long_description:
SharpestMinds is a mentorship program for data scientists based on income share agreements. Experienced engineers mentor aspiring data scientists, who then pay the engineers back a percentage of their first year's salary after they're hired.

SharpestMinds mentors come from world leading AI groups at top companies including Apple, Uber, Tesla, Facebook and Amazon.
one_liner: Peer-to-peer mentorships through income-share agreements.

name: YouTeam
long_description:
YouTeam has helped more than 60 YC startups hire top-notch engineers they couldn't find elsewhere.

YouTeam connects you with select offshore developers seeking full-time contracts that aren't listed on any freelance portals or job boards. We are the only platform accessing this previously untapped talent pool, allowing us to select the "crÃ¨me de la crÃ¨me" of the talent.
one_liner: We make it easy for startups to hire engineers.

name: Searchlight
one_liner: Talent AI improving quality of hire

name: CSPA
long_description:
The Computer Science Proficiency Assessment (CSPAâ„¢) is a comprehensive standardized exam for software engineers. The CSPA assesses your technical knowledge, skills, and abilities across a broad array of topics.  We write the CSPA exam questions, software engineers take the test, and we share the results with employers and schools.

MARKETING & SALES:
We actively find software engineers to take our test, whether direct or through partnerships.  On the other side, we actively partner with employers looking to hire.

PRODUCT:
We build the exam content manage system, a proctoring framework, and autograding system, as well as a SaaS employer product to browse the candidate database.
one_liner: The Computer Science Proficiency Assessment (CSPAâ„¢) is aâ€¦

name: Ascen
long_description: Ascen is a back office platform and employer of record for staffing firms.
one_liner: EOR for the staffing industry

name: Forage
long_description:
Forage is changing the world of career discovery and skill-building.

We partner with leading companies to create online job simulations for college students to build skills, gain experience and better understand different career paths. Our free digital learning simulations simulate a 'day in the life' of a junior employee, giving students the chance to complete hypothetical tasks, learn from employees and understand which roles are aligned with their interests and skills.

We believe 'talent is distributed evenly, but opportunity is not'. Our programs let the world's most iconic employers to open their doors to students from all backgrounds, regardless of where they are located, what they study and what university they go to. Employers use these simulations to attract, and ultimately hire, exceptional and high-intent candidates from broad and diverse audiences. 

There are now +4m students in the Forage community, and we currently run job simulations with leading organizations including GE, BCG, HSBC, Goldman Sachs, Lululemon, EY, Accenture, Latham & Watkins, JPMorgan Chase & Co, Citi, BNY Mellon, Prudential, Verizon, Bloomberg, Oliver Wyman, HPE, KPMG, Deloitte, and others.
one_liner: Online job simulations for companies to train, and then hire, students

name: Ashby
long_description:
At Ashby, we're improving the productivity of working professionals with intelligent and powerful software. We put a lot of effort into designing products that are approachable to beginners but mastered & extended by power users. In many ways, spreadsheets set the bar here.

Our first products provide talent teams with clever automation, powerful analytics tools, and customizable workflows packaged in great UX. We have many paying customers who love us and use us every day like Opendoor, Airtable, Duolingo, and Notion. Notion's Head of Talent said Ashby is "probably the tool we are in the most and rely on the most, as a recruiting team."

Our culture is motivated by Abhik's (my co-founder and Head of Engineering) and my belief that a small talented team, given the right environment, can build a great product and service fast (and work regular hours!). We hire exceptional, kind, thoughtful people and provide an environment where we can be happy, feel challenged, and do our best work.

We are well funded and backed by great investors, including Y Combinator, Elad Gil, and Lachy Groom. We'll share more once we meet!
one_liner: All-in-one recruiting platform that empowers hiring excellence inâ€¦

name: Landed
one_liner: Generative AI for frontline worker hiring

name: Pyxai
long_description: Pyxai helps organizations evaluate, identify and source top talent by focusing on the best indicators of long-term job success, soft skills. Our proprietary, AI driven assessment tool helps organizations increase retention by at least 30% all while reducing the time to hire by more than 50%.
one_liner: An assessment tool that evaluates people to predict future success

name: Dover
long_description:
Dover is on a mission to help every company build an amazing team. Every founder and business leader should have the tools and support they need to hire the right talent â€” fast.

Dover combines powerful free software with flexible recruiting services to help startups and growing companies scale efficiently. Dover is built around two core offerings:

Free Recruiting Tools:
Dover's ATS is a lightweight but powerful applicant tracking system built for busy founders and hiring managers. Itâ€™s as easy to use as a spreadsheet but includes everything you need to manage your first 100 hires â€” without the bloat of traditional ATS platforms. Hundreds of companies use Doverâ€™s free tools to streamline their hiring process and stay in control as they grow.

Recruiting Partner Marketplace:
When companies need help, Dover connects them with top-tier, fractional recruiters through our on-demand marketplace. Recruiting Partners are experienced, startup-savvy professionals who can step in quickly to manage sourcing, interviewing, closing, and more â€” without the cost or commitment of an agency or full-time hire.

Dover went through Y Combinator in 2019, and today 500+ companies use our product to run a better hiring process. We've raised $23M from top VCs.
one_liner: Your startup's all-in-one recruiting solution

name: Emi Labs
long_description:
At Emi Labs (YC '19) we are on a mission to increase frontline workers' access to
professional opportunities by building the infrastructure for Frontline Workers (check our
manifesto here: https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/our-manifesto-building-infrastructure-frontline-workers-emi-labs/). As our first step, we are transforming the high-volume recruiting
process of Frontline Workers to make it as simple, human, and fair as possible for both
Candidates and Recruiters. Our product is a SaaS recruitment platform powered by AI
that helps companies engage with candidates via text to drive faster and more efficient
hiring processes. We are growing fast, well funded, and obsessed with making our mission
a reality.

Some of their customers include Walmart, Burger King, Starbucks, 7-Eleven, Danone, Imperfect Foods, and Heineken.
one_liner: Helping great teams hire better frontline workers, faster.

name: Flo Recruit
one_liner: We help law firms hire the best legal talent faster

name: Hatchways
long_description: Easily customize GitHub-based technical assessments, where candidates can complete tasks like reviewing code, submitting a pull request, or improving a systemâ€™s design. Hatchways helps you build a state-of-the-art practical interview process that is customized to your role while saving you engineering interview load along the way.
one_liner: We make engineering interviewing look more like real work.

name: Vahan
one_liner: AI recruiter for India's massive blue-collar workforce

name: Alana
long_description:
HR focused ERP that automates processes for mid/large companies in LATAM through several modules:
Shift and calendar planning for staff
Check-in/out with geolocation and FR
Employee health and safety reporting and record
Performance management module
Career planninf module
one_liner: Staff management software for retail, manufacturing and hospitality

name: Mini Exhibitions

name: HireSweet
one_liner: A talent acquisition software built for data-driven recruiting teams.

name: Syncro
long_description: Use Syncro to align your internal comms, operational workflows, and knowledge sharing. Run operational and cultural practices that evolved during the scaling of Stripe, Gitlab, and Zapier.

name: Humanly
long_description:
Our mission is to empower the worldâ€™s hiring teams to grow engaged, high-performing organizations - by delivering human connection at scale through innovative technology, commitment, and fairness.

High-volume hiring is extremely broken - it is inefficient, ineffective, and biased. Our mission is to fix what is broken. We believe great hiring processes are centered around quality conversations between candidates and employers and a future where every candidateâ€™s journey starts with a conversation - a future where candidates are considered without bias or archaic artifacts like resumes and cover letters.
one_liner: We empower the worldâ€™s hiring teams to grow engaged, high-performingâ€¦

name: Pave
long_description: Pave allows you to make smarter comp decisions and eliminate spreadsheets, powered by real-time integrations with your HRIS, ATS, and Cap Table.
one_liner: Plan, communicate, and benchmark your compensation in real-time.

name: HENRY
long_description: We train software developers & data scientists for free and help them find a job remotely in exchange of a share of their future income.
one_liner: We train the best software engineers & data scientists in LatAm

name: Howdy.com
long_description:
Why Howdy.com?

Howdy was founded in 2018 to help Austin startups hire talented engineers who work within US time zones in Latin America.

Since then weâ€™ve grown to a team of over 300, and our platform has enabled hundreds of companies to hire individual teammates, set up remote, hybrid or in-office teams, and manage remote equipment assets and benefits.


Join over 200 companies, like Coinbase, Kojo,Truepill, Vanta and other YC companies that have hired with Howdy to build their tech outpost in Latin America.


Better talent: Howdy is deeply involved in the Latin American tech scene, regularly hosting meetups and inviting speakers and industry leaders into our local communities called Howdy Houses throughout Latin America. We get to personally know the top tech leaders who are interested in joining product teams in the US for the long-term. These individuals are not actively seeking jobs through freelancer platforms.


98% retention: Developer churn slows teams down. Thatâ€™s why, when you hire with Howdy, developers are automatically provided with premium health insurance, top-of-the-line Apple equipment, gym memberships, lunches and the use of class-A office spaces.
Your engineering culture: When you partner with Howdy, you're not just hiring individuals; you're gaining access to a skilled local workforce that becomes an extension of your team. We provide full support in all areas, from recruitment to equipment and office spaces, allowing you to build and directly oversee your engineering outpost in Latin America as your team grows.


All-in monthly pricing:

Software Developer:       $6k - 11k

Finance Back-office:       $1.8K - 3K

Customer Service:          $1.8K - 3K

Designer:                        $1.8K - 4K

Marketing:                       $2k - 4K

*All-in monthly rate includes: salary, taxes, benefits, computer, equipment, office space, Howdy fee & more
one_liner: We help US tech companies hire and manage software engineers in LATAM

name: ModernLoop
long_description:
ModernLoop helps every company automate and streamline recruiting operations to deliver the best candidate experience. In 2022, the Department of Labor estimates there is a global talent shortage of 40 million workers, and that number is expected to grow to over 85 million by 2030. In order for companies to win the war for talent, they need to provide a best-in-class candidate experience to recruit top talent, and our product aims at doing just that!

Our founders Lydia Han (CEO) and Chris Triolo (CTO) both founded ModernLoop in December of 2020 after they saw the challenges recruiting teams had when it came to coordinating hundreds of interviews across various teams, all while making sure both hiring managers and candidates had the best experience possible. After spending 15+ combined years at companies like Facebook, Slack, Brex and Salesforce, they understood what it took to enable talent teams do their best work, and are building a product to scale alongside them as they grow.

We created ModernLoop to serve companies of all sizes in every industry to help Talent teams interview candidates quicker, easier, and enhance productivity of teams as they continue their search for top talent!
one_liner: ModernLoop helps teams automate and streamline recruiting operations

name: Weekday
long_description: At Weekday, we have built the most accurate database of talent (250mn+ people in US & India with contact data), we run outbound campaigns to identify top talent for any role you might be hiring for. We generate the highest response rates (30-40%) on our campaigns making sourcing talent as easy as making a job posting
one_liner: AI recruiter that runs outbound sourcing campaigns to find top talent

name: Pangea.app
all_locations: New York, NY, USA; Providence, RI, USA; Remote
long_description:
The best way to know if someone is a good fit is to work with them on a project before you hire them full-time. 

At Pangea, we make contract-to-hire easy and painless.

We'll work with you to provide a shortlist of top, interested candidates.  

Our talent have an average of 5-7+ years of experience in design, growth, ops, product, and engineering, and are primarily based in the USA (but also extend to 155 countries)
one_liner: Hire Fractional Marketing + Design Talent

name: Manara
long_description: Manara untaps the human potential in the Arab world and helps global tech companies access high-quality, diverse talent. We identify the top software engineers in the region and offer them a last-mile solution to land their dream jobs: interview preparation and referrals.
one_liner: Connecting top Middle East talent to global tech jobs

name: Crew
long_description:
Crew is the next-gen ATS/CRM built just for recruiting agencies and independent recruiters. 

Itâ€™s all about modern sourcing, packed with cool automation and even a dash of AI. It's beautiful and well-designed. Plus, itâ€™s deeply integrated with LinkedInâ€”because letâ€™s be honest, thatâ€™s where we recruiters hang out most of the day. With Crew, you can forget about all that tedious copying/pasting, and tab-switching, making your workday a whole lot smoother.
one_liner: Next Gen ATS/CRM for Modern Recruitment Agencies

name: Talentdrop
all_locations: Menlo Park, CA, USA; Atherton, CA, USA; Remote
long_description:
When it comes to hiring, there are lots of resources to help managers get more candidates. But on average, only 1 in every 300 of these candidates actually get hired. Hiring managers and recruiters end up taking a robotic, brute force approach to sourcing - the kind of approach top talent hates.

Managers are increasingly finding that the simplest and most personable way to attract talent starts with their network. The best candidates want to work for great people, not faceless companies. Sharing open roles on places like LinkedIn, Slack, and Twitter unlocks enormous potential for a personalized recruiting approach across a curated talent pool, but these referrals are difficult to track across platforms and end up lost in the shuffle. We are changing that.

After more than a decade building teams at high-growth consumer tech companies like Instacart, Snapchat, and Uber, Maddy Nguyen turned her attention to creating collaborative tools for hiring managers and recruiters to source candidates from a wider range of networks and communities - while staying human.
one_liner: Your personal hiring page.

name: Airwork
long_description:
Airwork is an on-demand labor marketplace for premium blue collar workers. You can get an Airworker the same way you get an Uber, except instead of a taxi, someone shows up at your work site to work for the day.

Airwork fills 98% of shifts in 2 hours. We're currently live in 8 industries across Southern Ontario, Canada, and customers include Tesla, the Toronto Pearson Airport, and the CNE.

We're funded by YCombinator, Expa, Village Global, and SHL Capital.
one_liner: On-demand labour that's actually good

name: Dealls â€“Â Jobs & Mentoring
former_names: SejutaCita (cc: A Million Dreams in Indonesian)
long_description: Dealls offers a curated selection of job vacancies for individuals pre-screened and curated by our team. By partnering with us, 5000+ companies have saved time and money by receiving only eligible and top candidates. Job seekers love Dealls because they can apply to multiple top companies with a single click and receive responses 21X faster than with other platforms.
one_liner: Indonesia's #1 ATS & Job Portal to match top talents & companies

name: Juicebox
long_description:
In the past decade, the recruiting industry has not had any innovation. AI has created an opportunity to disrupt it through software that can reason and take actions.

Juicebox is an AI-powered recruiting platform. We build agentic workflows to identify, assess, and engage the best talent.

Weâ€™ve grown to 7 figures in revenue with 20% monthly growth. We have 500+ customers including Patreon, Replit, and leading AI labs.
one_liner: AI-powered talent sourcing for recruiters

name: Serra
long_description: Serra is an AI recruiter that fully automates candidate sourcing and outreach, finding ideal talent from LinkedIn, GitHub, Crunchbase, and your ATS. Companies hiring Serra skip sourcing entirely and simply get qualified interviews on their calendar.
one_liner: Your 24/7 AI Recruiter

name: Alex
long_description:
Alex is an AI recruiter for the future of hiring. Companies use us to get the best hiring signal on their applicant pool and hire in a fraction of the time.
Our AI recruiter has a live conversation over a video call with each of your candidates based on the interview questions you choose or that are recommended based on the job description. During the interview, our AI asks personalized follow-up questions in real-time based on the candidate's responses.
Our AI recruiter can be customized to your roles in minutes and has already conducted thousands of interviews across engineering, IT, retail, hospitality, and more.
one_liner: Your AI recruiter for interviewing and identifying the best talent

name: Lightscreen AI
long_description:
Lightscreenâ€™s voice + video AI interviewer enables companies to identify and invest in genuinely skilled candidates. It's already being used by high-growth startups and recruiting agencies to screen technical candidates. 

We provide companies with a voicebot that can run a full-length technical interview, does smart interruptions, and multi-modal cheating detection. The AI provides the company rubric-based, rich candidate evaluation in minutes and can be fully customized to ask questions and evaluate based on the company's needs.
one_liner: Voice + video AI interviewer

name: NextByte
long_description:
NextByteâ€™s AI recruiter helps you identify top candidates faster, so your team can focus on what matters â€“ building your product and hiring the best talent. Our platform understands the requirements for each role and tailors voice-driven technical and non-technical evaluations to surface candidates who are ready for your next onsite interview. 

NextByte can screen hundreds of candidates simultaneously and provides rubric-based, detailed evaluations in minutes. Our analytics dashboards provide a clear view of technical ability, problem-solving skills, and communication under pressure across your candidate pool, so you can confidently move the right candidates forward. With NextByte, hiring teams save time, reduce bias, and make faster, data-driven hiring decisions without sacrificing quality.
one_liner: AI recruiter tuned to identify the best vibe coders

name: Contrario
long_description: Contrario is a managed hiring network helping growth-stage startups and enterprises fill hard roles fast. We fill critical roles faster with AI-powered expert recruiters who deliver high-signal candidates quickly. Unlike a typical marketplace, Contrario white-glove delivers top candidates by pairing proprietary AI models with recruiter workflows to filter noise and surface only the best-fit talent.
one_liner: AI-powered recruiting team for startups

name: Vora AI
long_description: Vora gives every hiring manager an AI recruiter. Our AI agent, Rachel, automates talent sourcing by handling everything from identifying top talent, to writing personalized outreach to scheduling interviews directly on the hiring manager's calendar. This allows teams to focus on what matters most - talking to and closing the best candidates.
one_liner: AI recruiter for hiring managers

name: Spott
long_description:
Spott is the first AI-native ATS/CRM for recruiting & staffing firms. We built Spott because existing recruitment platforms require extensive manual work, are clunky to use, rely on fragmented add-ons, and are not designed for AI adoption.

Spott combines everything recruiting firms need, from a full ATS & CRM to AI agents across the entire workflow, into one AI-native solution. It enables recruiters to focus on what matters most and close more placements.
one_liner: AI-native ATS/CRM for recruiting firms

name: Clado
